fn.p: Eli S.J. Thoré conceived and designed the experiments, performed the experiments, analyzed the data, prepared figures and/or tables, authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft.
Arnout F. Grégoir conceived and designed the experiments, performed the experiments, approved the final draft.
Bart Adriaenssens analyzed the data, authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft.
Charlotte Philippe performed the experiments, approved the final draft.
Robby Stoks authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft.
Luc Brendonck contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, approved the final draft.
Tom Pinceel contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft.
